1. link #13

Link to Requirements Toolbox
Document: SupervisoryLogic_System_Requirements.slreqx
Location/Item: 3.1.2 Operating Mode Management High Level Requirements

3.1.2    Operating Mode Management High Level Requirements

OperatingModeManagement software component shall implement following functionalities:

·    Divide operational states of system into 6 main operating states:

o  All Controls Open Loop

o  Voltage Control Open Loop, LEDs Closed Loop Control

o  Voltage Control Closed Loop, LEDs Open Loop Control

o  All Controls Loop Closed

o  Automatic Operation

o  No Output

·    Has a parallel logic monitoring fault signal.

·    Manage transitions between operation states based on operational state request from user, sensor measurement, faults, and battery pack measurements.

"flag_resetSoCEstimation" (Inport)
